thread.title: Ant and Dec's Saturday Night Takeaway may be probed by TV watchdog after contestant swears live on air
thread.title_full: Ant and Dec's Saturday Night Takeaway may be probed by TV watchdog after contestant swears live on air

title: Ant and Dec's Saturday Night Takeaway may be probed by TV watchdog after contestant swears live on air
text:
TV Magazine f-bomb probe Ant and Decâ€™s Saturday Night Takeaway may be probed by TV watchdog after contestant swears live on air 
Viewers were stunned by the use of the f-word on the family-friendly show By RYAN KISIEL and Louise Randell, Senior Showbiz Reporter 27th February 2017, 2:52 am
